descriptions.description: This reinforcing loop accelerates team growth as more core developers provide mentorship, increasing the promotion rate and further expanding the core team.
This virtuous cycle amplifies team capability as mentorship builds experienced contributors who get promoted, creating more mentors to continue the cycle.
This balancing loop maintains team stability by limiting growth; as the core team grows, turnover increases, naturally regulating its size.
This balancing loop creates a delayed constraint on growth; while mentorship builds the contributor pipeline, it temporarily diverts core developer effort from coding.
